lastwhisper.name: Last Whisper
lastwhisper.bonus: When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 90% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

thiefsgloves.name: Thieves Gloves
thiefsgloves.bonus: Extra 10% Crit chance and 10% Dodge chance. This item takes all three item slots. On round begin, copy two random items.

handofjustice.name: Hand of Justice
handofjustice.bonus: At round start, the wearer randomly gains either 50% increased damage or 50 life on hit.

quicksilver.name: Quicksilver
quicksilver.bonus: The wearer is immune to crowd control.

iceborngauntlet.name: Iceborn Gauntlet
iceborngauntlet.bonus: After casting a spell, the wearer’s next basic attack freezes the target for 1.5 seconds.

trapclaw.name: Trap Claw
trapclaw.bonus: The wearer starts combat with a spell shield. Stun the enemy that breaks the shield.

runaanshurricane.name: Runaan's hurricane
runaanshurricane.bonus: Basic Attacks fire an additional missile at another nearby enemy, dealing 60% of the wearer's Attack damage and applying on-hit effects.

frozenheart.name: Frozen Heart
frozenheart.bonus: Nearby enemies' attack speed is slowed by 40%. (Stacking increases the radius of this effect, not the amount of the slow)

guardianangel.name: Guardian Angel
guardianangel.bonus: Revives champ with 400 HP after 2 seconds.

guinsoosrageblade.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
guinsoosrageblade.bonus: Attacks give 5% Attack Speed. Stacks infinitely.

hextechgunblade.name: Hextech Gunblade
hextechgunblade.bonus: Heal for 25% of all damage dealt.

hush.name: Hush
hush.bonus: Attacks have a 20% chance to prevent enemy champion from gaining mana for 4 seconds.

ionicspark.name: Ionic Spark
ionicspark.bonus: Enemies within 3 hexes that cast a spell are zapped, taking magic damage equal to 200% of their max Mana.

locketoftheironsolari.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
locketoftheironsolari.bonus: On start of combat, shields allies within two hexes in the same row for 250/275/300 damage for 8 seconds (scales with wearer’s Star Level)

deathblade.name: Death Blade
deathblade.bonus: On a kill or assist, gain an additional 15 Attack Damage until end of combat (Stacks infinitely).

ludensecho.name: Luden's Echo
ludensecho.bonus: Deals 120/160/200 magic damage (scales with wearer’s Star Level)

morellonomicon.name: Morellonomicon
morellonomicon.bonus: Spells burn for 18% of max HP over 10s and reduce healing by 80%.

titansresolve.name: Titan's Resolve
titansresolve.bonus: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a 2% stacking damage bonus, up to 100%. At 50 stacks the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

redbuff.name: Red Buff
redbuff.bonus: Attacks burn for 18% of max HP over 10s and reduce healing by 80%.

redemption.name: Redemption
redemption.bonus: At 30% health heal all nearby allies for 1200 HP.

seraphsembrace.name: Seraph's Embrace
seraphsembrace.bonus: Regain 20 mana each time a spell is cast

spearofshojin.name: Spear of Shojin
spearofshojin.bonus: After casting, gain 18% of max mana per attack.

statikkshiv.name: Statikk Shiv
statikkshiv.bonus: Every 3rd attack deals 80 magic damage to 3/4/5 enemies (scales with wearer’s Star Level)

swordbreaker.name: Sword Breaker
swordbreaker.bonus: Attacks have a 25% to disarm for 3s.

giantslayer.name: Giant Slayer
giantslayer.bonus: Attacks deal an additional 5% enemy max Health as True Damage.

bramblevest.name: Bramble Vest
bramblevest.bonus: Negates bonus damage from critical hits on the wearer. When the wearer is hit by a Basic Attack, a hail of thorns hits nearby enemies for 80/120/160 magic damage (increases with the holder's star level and can only damage once every 2s).

titanichydra.name: Titanic Hydra
titanichydra.bonus: Attacks deal 3% Max Health to target and adjacent enemies behind them.

zekesherald.name: Zeke's Herald
zekesherald.bonus: On start of combat, allies 2 spaces to the left and right gain +15% Attack Speed.

zephyr.name: Zephyr
zephyr.bonus: On start of combat banish an enemy for 6 seconds.
